name: The Janitor (itch) (Typeable)
description:
You found Mossaku, your poker-faced co-worker, working overtime again. Therefore you decided to have a little random chit-chat with him. There's totally nothing suspicious with him, nor anything in this game.

  • Under 500 words
  • Only 2 choices in the whole game (fr)
  • 1 ending
  • Semi kinetic-novel

Trigger warning: Slight mention of abduction 

CREDITS:

Art and Story: Typeable

BGM: OtoLogic

Background: Pixabay

Hello, thanks for checking out my second finished game! I made this in 2 days and it's not really done properly XD.  This is my first time publishing a game on itch.io, so yeah...

This is only a prologue to the actual story I had in mind.
